data.name: Hand In Hand
data.detailed_description:
An atmospheric platformer with co-op play in single-player mode.

Immerse yourself in the ethnic world of two heroes, solve puzzles and overcome obstacles together, explore the fairy forest and other locations, help each other in battles against bosses.

You can defeat bosses and solve puzzles only by coordinating your actions in controlling each character with each thumbstick.

Two souls live in a fairy-tale world. But once everything changes, they quarrel and lose each other. Now each of them must independently embark on a journey full of difficulties and dangers. And only after finding a fragile connection between themselves and walking hand in hand they can meet. This is a story about the importance of relationships and mutual assistance. But every story has a deeper meaning ...

Start this unforgettable adventure and find the answer.

data.short_description: An atmospheric platformer with co-op play in single-player mode. Immerse yourself in the ethnic world of two heroes, solve puzzles and overcome obstacles together, explore the fairy forest and other locations, help each other in battles against bosses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 /ATI Radeon HD 2600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 /ATI Radeon HD 2600
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
